name: Piggy Beneath The Surface - Chapter 1
description:
Military Starter, Kona is given the task to travel to the south to collect weapons for the military. But will it go all to plan? 

From the creator of Goose Chat comes a fanmade game to Piggy, Piggy Beneath The Surface. Featuring custom and new characters and iconic ones. Taking please between Book 1 and 2. Focusing on Kona, and other characters.
